holes.description: A straightaway par 5. The hole features a wide fairway with bunkers on both sides.
A par 4 with a slight dogleg left. Bunkers protect the fairway.
A challenging par 3 with water hazards on the left and bunkers around the green.
A long par 4 with a dogleg right. Accuracy off the tee is crucial.
A par 4 with a slight dogleg left. The fairway is guarded by bunkers.
A challenging par 5 with water hazards and bunkers along the fairway.
A long par 3 with bunkers protecting the green.
A par 4 with a slight dogleg right. The green is well-guarded by bunkers.
A straightaway par 4. Avoid the bunkers on the fairway for a clear approach shot.
A challenging par 4 with a dogleg left. Bunkers guard the left side of the fairway.
A short par 3 with bunkers surrounding the green.
A par 4 with a dogleg right. Accuracy off the tee is crucial.
A par 5 with a slight dogleg left. Beware of the water hazard on the left side.
A par 4 with a slight dogleg right. The fairway is guarded by bunkers.
A par 3 with a large green surrounded by bunkers.
A par 4 with a dogleg left. Accuracy off the tee is crucial to avoid trouble.
A par 4 with a slight dogleg right. The fairway is narrow with bunkers on both sides.
A challenging par 5 with a dogleg left. Long hitters can go for the green in two, but beware of the hazards.
